select s.id, s.amount, s.sum, date_format(s.time, '%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as time, p.name as name, p.type as price, p.kind FROM ${tableName1} s left join ${tableName2} p on s.id = p.id where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ${day} DAY) <= date(time) limit #{start},10
and p.kind = #{kind}

select sum(s.amount) as amount, sum(s.sum) as sum, p.kind as kind FROM ${tableName1} s left join ${tableName2} p on s.id = p.id where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ${day} DAY) <= date(time) group by p.kind
